channel.title: azure on Jordi Smit
channel.description: Recent content in azure on Jordi Smit

item.title: Adding Application Insight Based Monitoring to Fast API
item.description: Application Insights is Azure’s logging and monitoring service, but how do you use it with Fast API? In this blog post, we will explore how to send logs and traces to Application Insights.

item.title: How to Find the Last Record in a Group Using KQL
item.description: Today, I was building a dashboard in Azure’s Application Insight that needed to show the number of deployments behind each load balancer over time in an application.
